lines.text: Hiya Becky! Hey you dropped your purse. Sorry I'm late.
Who do you think you are?
Steve McQueen? Hey, look i'm sorry but after what happened last night your lucky i'm here at all. You'll never believe...
Lucky? Do you know how long I've been waiting?
Sorry!
If I miss that audition, I'll wring your neck.
Hey...
Taxi!
Ah... Becky, wait! You'll never make it that way!
Where to?
Central broadcasting studio downtown.
I hope your not in any hurry lady.
Becky, are you crazy? It's bumper to bumper downtown.
C'mon. Give me one more chance?
Guess I don't have much choice.
You don't if you want to get there on time. Hang on!
Woah!
Hey knock it off, you're making me nervous!
I'm making you nervous?
Why don't I come to this dance audition with ya? To give ya moral support?
I think I can handle it!
Wait, hold that pose, don't move. Got it! This film will be a masterpiece! Here, This is the part I love! Look at that bike did ya ever see anything like it?
No, That's what worry's me...

[the phone rings]
City dump, hello? Oh, hi Mark, We've been watching your screen test.
Stacy, put Becky on, I gotta speak with her, it's important.
I bet! You movie stars think everything you do is important! Hang on.
Hi Mark, What is it? Not Eve again?
She's got some kind of talk show right?

I need your help, Mark. The enemy's I mentioned are here to extract the data stored here in my memory matrix. Once they have it, they will destroy the Earth. The process is already under way I don't know who it is but someone with access to my higher functions has begun transmitting the information to them. Soon, they will have everything they want.

I am Colonel B.D. Andrews speaking for the supreme military command of the united Earth government. The time has come to refute a preposterous rumor that is spreading throughout the population. Recent military maneuvers in the northern province have been misinterpreted by the irresponsible people as evidence that we have been attacked or invaded by an enemy power. If you hear these rumors, ignore them we have not been invaded, nor are we at war!
Alright, so I don't own you. Nobody owns you. But can I at least borrow you for tonight?
Who are these guys anyway?
